SELECT MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.MS_VESSEL_ID, MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID, MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.ENABLED,
MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_NAME, MS_SCHEDULE_KIND.SCHEDULE_KIND_NAME,
MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.DELETE_FLAG, MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.CREATE_DATE, MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.UPDATE_DATE, MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.CREATE_MS_USER_ID, MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE
INNER JOIN MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL ON MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID = MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN MS_SCHEDULE_KIND ON MS_SCHEDULE_KIND.SCHEDULE_KIND_ID = MS_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL.SCHEDULE_KIND_ID
WHERE MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE.DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE( MS_VESSEL_ID, SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID, ENABLED, DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :MS_VESSEL_ID, :SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID, :ENABLED, :DELETE_FLAG, :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ENABLE SET ENABLED = :ENABLED,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID AND SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID = :SCHEDULE_KIND_DETAIL_ID
